Error.Message: SQLSTATE[42S22]: Column not found: 1054 Unknown column 'L.UserPhoneMobile' in 'where clause'

Argument.SQL:
SELECT			L.*, 
				CONCAT(L.LoanPrefix, '_', L.LoanID) AS LoanLookupCaption,
				U.UserSignInName, 
				U.UserPhoneMobile,
				LS.LoanSchemeName,
				'' AS _Other

FROM			ims_loan AS L
	LEFT JOIN	sphp_user AS U ON U.UserID = L.UserID
	LEFT JOIN	ims_loanscheme AS LS ON LS.LoanSchemeID = L.LoanSchemeID
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = L.YID*/
 WHERE 1 = 1 AND L.UserPhoneMobile = 182000000  ORDER BY LoanID ASC  LIMIT 0, 50
